document_data.name: Monica Langin
document_data.mainbody: '''Monica Langin''' was a concubine in [[Grand Caliph]] [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]]'s Royal Harim in [[Huzuz]].
document_data.Description: Monica had fiery red hair and was so beautiful that she caught Khalil's eye and was asked to join the harem.
document_data.Activities: After being invited to join the harem, Monica was unsure if life in the harem would be too much of a lifestlye change for the [[ranger]] inside of her. She finally accepted Khalil's offer, but was unable to fully adapt to that lifestyle. Khalil released her from her obligations six months after she joined the harem. She would stop by periodically and visit.
document_data.History: Monica lived originally far away north from Huzuz.
